amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate all the earmarks in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for each earmark listed in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 39 - 388 (Roll no. 640).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Campbell (CA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 39 - 388 (Roll no. 640).
